experience.description: Develop and maintain robust backend services using C++ for high-concurrency financial processing systems. Collaborate with the QA team to implement comprehensive automated testing suites. Optimize Java-based middleware components to reduce latency by 20%.

Assisted in the migration of legacy Java applications to a modern microservices architecture. Participated in code reviews and utilized Git for version control. Fixed critical bugs in the internal reporting tool, improving data accuracy for stakeholders.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
